text: Mwe murabakunda nyamara bo ntibabakunda, kandi mwemera ibitabo byose. N’iyo bahuye namwe bavuga (babaryarya) bati "Twaremeye", ariko bakwiherera bakabarumira imitwe y’intoki kubera uburakaribabafitiye. Vuga uti "Nimwicwe n’uburakaribwanyu". Mu by’ ukuri, Allah ni Umumenyi uhebuje w’ibiri mu bituza
